basic_info_description: Complete this onboarding process to start using {{company.name}}. Let's start with basic details.
address_description: Please enter your permanent address, which we require to verify your identity.
identity_description: It must contain an official photo ID.
finances_description: Choose a document to upload as proof of income
plaid_link_bank_account_text:
You will be redirected to **Plaid** to add your bank account securely.

Please do not reload the app or click the “Back” button.
plaid_wyre_link_bank_account_text:
You will be redirected to **Plaid** via **Wyre** to add your bank account securely.

Please do not refresh the page or click the “Back” button of your browser.
wyre_add_bank_account_error: Unable to add wyre bank account
onboarding_success: Welcome to KrillPay. We're super excited to have you join our community.
